Description: The Point at Ashburn offers renters the very best combo of location and lifestyle. Situated in Ashburn, Virginia, our studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment homes boast the finest appointments; state of the art kitchens with custom cabinets and granite countertops, vinyl plank flooring, washer and dryer and a private balcony. Resort-style pool, the 24-hour state-of-the-art Fitness Center, Business Center, free coffee in our Great Room and wi-fi throughout the common areas, but we are now pleased to announce that we've made them even better! The Point at Ashburn provides commuters with instant connectivity to the I-495 and Rte. 28 and offers residents the ability to walk to The Shops at Moorefield Village, 150,000 square feet of some of the hottest restaurants and retailers.

Description: Camden Silo Creek is situated around a nature preserve in the Broadlands subdivision of Ashburn, Virginia, conveniently located near the Loudoun County Parkway and the Dulles Greenway. We offer spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with luxurious features such as custom espresso cabinetry, wood-style flooring, stainless steel appliances, full-size washer and dryers, 9-foot ceilings, fireplaces, wraparound balconies that showcase a beautiful view of Ashburn and more. Our amenities include pet-friendly accommodations with a gated dog park and a short trip to popular pet destinations, as well as a 24-hour fitness center, access to a half-mile walking trail with exercise stations, resort-style pool and an on-site playground. Camden Silo Creek also sits just minutes from three beautiful parks and the best of Ashburn's shopping, dining, and entertainment. Please note that all floor plan availability is subject to change. Description: Looking for an affordable home in a welcoming community? You're here. Ashburn Meadows is an income-restricted community of two- and three-bedroom apartment homes in Ashburn Village, a master-planned housing development in the heart of Loudoun County. Our idyllic setting provides the perfect backdrop for gathering with friends, family, and neighbors, whether at the bus stop, on our playground, or around our gleaming community pool. Plus, our location offers close proximity to some of the area's best schools and employment opportunities; a host of recreational amenities, including the local sports pavilion, the Washington Old Dominion trail, several lakes, and miles of community hiking and biking pathways; as well as plentiful shopping and dining options at the nearby Dulles Town Center Mall, One Loudoun, and Ashburn Village Shopping Center. At Ashburn Meadows, you can have it all.

Whatever lifestyle you choose can be accommodated with our spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes. Residents enjoy luxury features such as stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, open concept floor plans, 9-foot ceilings, oversized garden tubs, vaulted ceilings, special cable, and WiFi package and full-size washers and dryers. Community amenities include outdoor social space fit with grilling stations, a 24-hour fitness center and quick access to Ashburn's beautifully groomed walking trails. Exploring Ashburn is made easy, as Camden Ashburn Farm is just minutes from Dulles Greenway, Loudoun County Parkway and One Loudoun for shopping, dining, and entertainment. Description: Westwind Farms is located six miles northwest of the Dulles International Airport, in Ashburn, Virginia, a suburb of Washington DC. Westwind is less than a half mile west of the Dulles Greenway Toll Road, three miles east of Brambleton Regional Park's golf course and recreational facilities, and six miles southwest of the Dulles Town Center Mall. This community's one, two and three bedroom apartment homes feature the perfect mix of traditional style and contemporary design, with nine-foot ceilings, crown molding, soaking tub, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and full-size washer and dryer. Community features include a clubhouse with WiFi lounge, swimming pool with poolside WiFi, fitness studio with attached children's play area, and more.

Our surroundings are something to brag about! at Atley on the Greenway you're well connected to the Metro for a hands-free commute or simply jump on Dulles Greenway - where you're minutes from a plethora of shopping, dining and year-round recreation spots. Our nearby neighborhood favorites include: Shoppes at Ryan Park, Claim Jumper, Yen's Cafe, Ford's Fish Shack, The Buffalo Wing Factory & Pub, Bonefish Grill, Bangrak Thai, Manhattan Pizza and Clyde's Willow Creek Farm. Ashburn park is a few miles away, while Regal Cinemas IMAX theater is a short drive too. Any level of entertainment is at your fingertips at Atley.

Description: ***Income Limits Apply***The Grove at Flynn’s Crossing is a community designed to offer all the benefits and amenities of luxury apartment living at an affordable cost. Striking traditional architectural design and lush landscaping create a park-like setting that satisfies your eye as well as your lifestyle. The spectacular clubhouse is the center of the community’s social activities. Here, residents can tone up in the state-of-the-art fitness center or swim laps in the club’s sparkling swimming pool. We are pleased to offer spacious 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartment homes. The Grove at Flynn’s Crossing also offers its residents one of the area’s most convenient locations right in the middle of Northern Virginia's booming cities. Nearby shopping, entertainment, and restaurants make Flynn’s Crossing the perfect place to live. The beauty, the amenities, and the convenience will make you happy to call Flynn’s Crossing home. Description:
Looking for roommate to share a modern, professionally decorated 4BR/3.5BA 2600 sq.ft. luxury end-unit townhouse in Brambleton area of Ashburn, VA. 1BR/1BA with closet available Nov 1 for move-in (approx 130 sq.ft). Master BR/BA with WIC and soaking tub (approx 400 sq.ft) also expected to be available on/around Nov 1.
Rent will be $850/month flat, which includes all Utilities plus a monthly cleaning service (yes they scrub the bathrooms!). Master will be $1000/month flat, all-inclusive. First and last month rent required. This price includes:
* 	Monthly cleaning service
* 	Electricity, Gas, Water, High-speed FIOS internet
* 	Verizon TV extended cable including sports + movies package (including HBO)
Each roommate will get their own private bedroom and bathroom and will have access to ALL the common areas of the house, which features:
* 	Professionally decorated living, dining and family areas
* 	Gourmet kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, double ovens and upgraded cabinets
* 	Mahogany hardwood floors throughout the entire main floor
* 	Black granite counter tops in the kitchen and all the bathrooms
* 	Cozy fireplace with white carrara marble surround
* 	Spacious outdoor deck
* 	Recessed lighting in all the common areas
* 	Upgraded tile, light fixtures and faucets in all the bathrooms
Two IT contracting professionals (guys, early 30s). Please provide quick summary describing yourself, target move-in, etc.
Short commute to several areas including: Ashburn, Leesburg, Chantilly, Herndon, Reston, Sterling, Dulles, Fairfax, Tyson's

Pet Policy: Dogs Allowed

Description:
End unit Townhouse in desired Loudoun Valley Estates. Shows like a model home with approx. $30K in recent upgrades: 5" plank hardwoods on main level, staircase & hall, extensive lighting package, speaker system & plantation shutters. Master suite with tray ceiling, walk-in closet, separate shower & soaking tub. Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite counters & upgraded cabinets. Excellent community amenities: swimming pool, fitness center, clubhouse, tennis courts, basketball court, tot lot.
APPLY ONLINE: https://arlingtonrealty.appfolio.com/listings/detail/87e352eb-c5cf-4629-9b9a-6a2129a39b03. 
TERMS
* Vacant - available immediately
* Min. 12 mo. / Max. 24 mo. lease
* No Smoking
* Pets considered on case-by-case basis
* Tenant only pays gas and electric
* Landlord pays condo fee (covers water, sewer, trash removal, community amenities, common area maintenance, management)
* Security Deposit: $2,000
* Application fee per adult on lease: $50 (non-refundable)
* Parking: attached 1-car garage and off-street driveway
* 3% annual escalation on leases over 1 year.

Description:
1 car garage with 4 bedroom and 3.5 bathrooms. Upgraded cherry cabinets, granite counter tops, stainless steel appliances. Rent includes verizon high speed internet and cable. Walking distance to Briar Woods high school. Access to all Brambleton amenities, pools, town center, gym, running trails, tot lots, & more
Owner pays HOA fees which include Verizon high speed internet and fios cable (excluding setup box rental), snow removal, trash removal, lawn mowing. Tenant is responsible for gas, electricity and water.

Description:
Wonderful basement apartment with private entrance and assigned parking spot. Unit includes large open floor plan, living room with wet bar and fridge, full bath, large bedroom and walk-in closet, washer/dryer, private entry and assigned parking spot steps away from entrance. Conveniently located seconds away from Loudoun One, shopping, entertainment and major commuting routes (Rt.7, Rt.28, Toll Road/267). Ideal for professionals looking for part time housing in Northern Virginia.
Rent includes all utilities! Looking for 1 person and must have 850+ credit score. Background check and credit check will be required.
Sorry about the photos, renter is in the process of moving out.
Available October 15th
- Rent: $1,150/m
- Deposit: $1,150
- None smoker
- No pets
- MUST have above 700 credit score
- Rent includes all utilities

Images: ![Primary Photo - 22540 Amendola Terrace](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/N1eeZVxFHPwuieXSOFsRawdEkKmQAgBsBPRtFP9V6xc/110/22540-amendola-terrace-ashburn-va-primary-photo.jpg)
Description:
1 BHK appt. Located in the heart of Ashburn is available for rent.
The Appt. includes free access to pool, gym, valet Trash Pickup, gated Secured Entry to the building and other Common areas. Enjoy the comfortable carefree lifestyle of a small town combined with the convenience of being within walking distance to shopping, superb dining and just 10 min away from IAD (Washington Dulles) Airport.
Harris Teeter, Day Spa's , Animal Hospital, Woof Gang Bakery, Nova Enrichment Academy and Taekwondo classes(Dragon Yong In) are just 5 min walk from the appt.
Instant Connectivity to route 28 and route 7.
3 public schools nearby
Moorefield Station Elementary School, Stone hill middle school and Rock ridge high school.
$150 gift card if you sign up before Oct 2.

Pet Policy: No Pets Allowed

Description:
Gorgeous condo in Ashburn! Lake View! This is a two-on-two condo, meaning the bottom two floors are one condo and the second two floors are another separate condo. This condo is the upper two floors and is an end unit so there's tons of light with the whole end side of the condo lined with windows giving a view of the lake. There's also a bay window in the living room and a balcony off the back. A beautiful set of French doors separate the Kitchen, Kitchenette, and secondary living/office space from the front of the unit where you have the dining room and main living area. The master bedroom is very spacious and has two walk-in closets (also spacious), along with a master bath that has two separate sinks with under cabinet storage, a linen closet, luxury shower with two shower heads, and a separate water closet. The laundry room is also on the second floor making for no hassle going up and down stair with laundry baskets. Two additional medium sized bedrooms and a full dual vanity bathroom are to the back of the second floor. There is also a private one car garage, and additional parking space in the driveway.
Only one minute from the toll road entrance, you can be downtown in less than 40 minutes. Close to shopping, dining, entertainment, medical facilities, and 10 minutes from Dulles International Airport. For those with children, this is one of the most sought after school districts. Ashburn is a beautiful, well-planned, and safe community.

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Cheery 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome offers 3 finished levels in Ashburn Village! - Skylight and vaulted ceilings make this property bright and welcoming. Complete with a charming country kitchen featuring oak cabinetry and island, separate dining room, and Pergo floors in the formal living room. Don’t forget the spacious breakfast area with French doors leading to large deck with steps to lower level brick patio, second deck, raised planter box and fenced-in yard. Roomy finished walk-out rec room complete with half bath in the basement, and large storage/laundry area with utility sink. Featuring large bedrooms complete with vaulted ceilings, and the master suite features a walk-in closet. Conveniently close to all Ashburn amenities and located on a great lot backing to open common area. NO smoking. A pet will be considered on a case-by-case basis. LB Application & LB Lease required.
(RLNE3588315) Other Amenities - Other- 2 decks, Pool, Yard, Patio.

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Lovely, spacious 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath townhome in the heart of Ashburn Farm - FRESH paint, NEW carpeting and re-finished hardwood floors throughout! This incredible property features a wonderfully open layout with wood floors, beautiful molding, and large bedrooms. Eat-in kitchen with granite counters and all stainless steel appliances, and separate dining room. Custom wood deck and bright patio looking into fenced yard. Fully finished basement with bar and mini-fridge could be used as a 4th bedroom with full bath! NO smoking and NO pets. LB Application & LB Lease required.
(RLNE3515254) Other Amenities - Other- stainless steel appliances, Garage, Yard, Patio, Deck.

Description:
(571) 502-3070 - Rent a Single Family Home for less than a Townhome!!! - Great curb appeal and stunning interior! Spacious colonial with sunken living room, formal dining room, and light-filled kitchen with Corian countertops and breakfast area opening to large family room with fireplace and French doors to the broad wooden deck * Spacious master bedroom with 2 walk-in closets and attached luxury bath--twin sinks, separate shower, and whirlpool soaking tub! Full unfinished basement for ample storage * Fully fenced back yard with side gate * Walking distance to Village amenities: pools, parks,bike paths,tennis courts,Sports Pavilion & shopping. No smoking, no pets.
Lease term: 1 - 3 year
Qualifications: 2 years of full-time employment history, 2 years of rental history (or home ownership), good credit, household income at least $102,000 (for groups sharing, that would be the sum of the 2 lowest incomes).
Listed by Aaquil Atkins, Realtor.
Better Homes & Garden Premier 
For information and showings contact Aaquil with your phone number 
at Aaquil.Atkins@Bhgpremier.com.
Showings by appointment.
This property is professionally managed by 
Peake Management, Inc. 
Licensed in the Commonwealth of Virginia
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3506957) Other Amenities - Other- auto gar dr opn, corian counters, crown molding, fireplace equip., fp screen, mba/sep shwr, master walk-in closet, rough in ba, shades/blinds, sump pump, tub-soaking, w/w carpeting., walk-in closets. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Spacious 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome with 3 finished levels in the heart of Ashburn Village! - Spacious bedrooms on the upper level, and master bedroom has make-up area with sink. The finished lower level is complete with fireplace and full bath, and could be used as a third bedroom or rec room. Large country style kitchen with pass-through to dining room and neutral décor throughout, and don’t forget the storage room! INTERIOR WILL BE TOTALLY PAINTED, CLEANED & NEW DISHWASHER! Walk-out to common area and view of pond, and conveniently close to Sports Center and shopping! NO smoking. A small pet will be considered on a case-by-case basis. LB Application & LB Lease required.
(RLNE3476650) Other Amenities - Other- fireplace.

Luxury, 2 Car Garage Town home, freshly painted and in move in condition * Hardwood flooring on main living level * Warm Gas Fireplace in Living Area that adjoins Gourmet Kitchen, perfect for entertaining * Updated Appliances * Front Load Washer/Dryer * Custom Deck & Fenced Rear Yard * Plenty of Storage! No Smoking, Pets CBC, HOA Fee Inc

Description: Wonderful Sunny Brambleton 2 level 3 bedroom 2.5 bath town home/condo. Like New condition. 9' Ceilings, 1Car Garage w/ direct access to the kitchen. No carrying groceries up the stairs. Walking distance to Brambleton Town Center w/ restaurants, movie theater, health club, & grocery store. Granite counters, full-size washer/dryer, nice appliances & Fireplace. Rent includes FIOS internet & Cable TV. For any questions or viewings, please contact Keven Plunkett with Century 21 Accent Homes at 703-922-4348.

Description:
In the heart of Ashburn Village, The Fields puts you right in the middle of the Dulles Tech Corridor, a blossoming business and residential community in Northern Virginia. Surrounded by shopping and dining, Ashburn offers you everything you want close to home. Shop and dine at Dulles Town Center
Find great deals at Leesburg Corner Premium Outlets
Make your way to Dulles in just minutes
Hop on the Dulles Greenway, Rt. 28 and Rt. 7 to reach all the charms of Northern Virginia

Description: Wait list is currently closed. Please call to check status befor visiting the property. Shreveport Ridge Apartments is a brand new complex that opened in summer 2014. We are a certified Earthcraft "green community" located in the #1 master planned community of Northern Virginia called Brambleton, near Ashburn. Shreveport Ridge is a 98 unit family apartment community designed specifically as "workforce housing". We offer one - four bedroom units with amenities that include washer/dryers in each unit, dishwasher, and central air/heat with energy efficient geothermal heating. Our amenities include a playground, free parking, anda community room for various activities. This is a smoke-free complex / community. We are convenient to Dulles Airport, One Loudoun Baseball Stadium, Dulles Greenway, and Route's 7 & 28. Shreveport Ridge is professionally managed and maintained by TM Associates Management.
